long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ST DEI plugin is used by talent marketers to promote inclusive content in job descriptions, candidate communications and talent marketing content. This plugin can be used to detect and eliminate unconscious bias (like gender, race, age and disability) and toxicity in all online content, thus promoting inclusion.
